pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear Regression and Logistic Regression with Missing Covariates // Estimate parameters of linear regression and logistic regression with missing covariates with missing data, perform model selection and prediction, using EM-type algorithms. Jiang W., Josse J., Lavielle M., TraumaBase Group (2020) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2019.106907.
